alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schenectady; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:49PM EDT until April 09 at 9:43AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Burtonsville. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water reaches Priddle Camp Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 7.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 6 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.2 feet on 03/06/1979. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Burtonsville Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Thu 10 pm: 4.1 Forecast: Fri 2 am 5.1 Fri 8 am 7.2 Fri 2 pm 6.7 Fri 8 pm 6.6 Sat 2 am 6.2 Sat 8 am 5.5 Sat 2 pm 4.8 Sat 8 pm 4.3 Sun 2 am 4.1 Sun 8 am 3.8 Sun 2 pm 3.6 &&
